SageTVPlugin.Name: Ortus MQ
SageTVPlugin.Description: Ortus Event/JMS Queue Plugin - A plugin to allow developers to utilize the ApacheMQ module and implement message queueing to communicate between the clients and servers
SageTVPlugin.Author: jphipps
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes: 1.0.10 : Fix various exceptions caused by invalid parms in latest sage version. Fix client connection logic 1.0.9 : Fix various exceptions caused by invalid parm types
